You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesE E] > &eta;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Eta;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0397/index.htm U+00397].
  * `&eta;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03b7/index.htm U+003B7].
